text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 50% Bleach and 0.1% Tween for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water. Seeds were stratified at 4ËšC for 2 days before being planted on media containing 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 0.5g/L MES, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 5.7 with KOH. At 5 days, seedlings were transferred to standard pH (pH 5.7) or low pH (pH 4.6) media for 24 hours prior to protoplasting and FACS sorting. Low pH media is 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 3mM DMG, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 4.6 with KOH. Standard pH is the same except pH is adjusted to 5.7.
Seedlings were grown for 5 days (described in Birnbaum et al. 2005) on pH 5.7 media before transfer either to pH 5.7 or pH 4.6 media for 24 hours prior to protoplasting and FACS sorting
Total RNA was extracted with Qiagen Rneasy micro kit according to manufacturer's instructions
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix two-cycle protocol from total RNA isolated from sorted cells
hybs with fragmented cRNA were preformed by Expression Analysis (Durham, NC)
scans were preformed by Expression Analysis (Durham, NC)
CHP files contain MAS 5.0 probe set summarizations using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The mean target intensity of each array was set to 250.
